entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 1:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -20.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
